                                  Date tokenReceived,
                                  String clientId,

        Parameters:

        tokenReceived - Date that token was received
        clientId - Client id of application
        clientSecret - Client secret of application

                                  Date tokenReceived,
                                  String clientId,
                                  String clientSecret,
                                  String redirectURI)
        Set a previously requested OAuth token
        Parameters:
        token - Token object from server
        tokenReceived - Date that token was received
        clientId - Client id of application
        clientSecret - Client secret of application
        redirectURI - Redirect URI used for OAuth

      • setOAuthAccessCode

        public void setOAuthAccessCode​(String code,
                               String clientId,
                               String clientSecret,
                               String redirectURI)
                        throws OnshapeException
        Set an access code received from an OAuth request.
        Parameters:
        code - Code returned from server
        clientId - Client id of application
        clientSecret - Client secret of application
        redirectURI - URI to redirect to after authentication
        Throws:
        OnshapeException - On HTTP or serialization error.

                       throws OnshapeException
        Refresh the OAuth token previously fetched
        Throws:
        OnshapeException - if no token previously set or if refresh call fails

      • call

        public final <T> T call​(String method,
                        String url,
                        Object payload,
                        Map<String,​Object> urlParameters,
                        Map<String,​Object> queryParameters,
                        Class<T> type)
                 throws OnshapeException
        Performs the HTTP call and transforms the result to the required class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Return type
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method
        url - URL
        payload - Payload object for POST/PUT calls
        urlParameters - Map of path parameters
        queryParameters - Map of query parameters
        type - Return type
        Returns:
        Response object
        Throws:
        OnshapeException - On HTTP or serialization error.
